caption:
Every time someone watches this video, it helps feed someone in need. 🥘

👇 COMMENT “BEAST” and I’ll send you the link — or tap the link in my bio to watch it now. 
I’m honored to join my friend Jimmy, known to millions as @mrbeast — not just the most followed creator on YouTube, but a force for good — who’s using his platform to make real, lasting change.
 As part of my goal to provide 100 billion meals in the next 10 years, I’ve partnered with Mr Beast and his team to deliver 10 million meals together—  to families across Africa and right here in the U.S. — because hunger knows no borders, and neither should compassion. 🌎❤️

Every view of this video helps pay for 1 meal for 1 person, so I invite you to watch, to share, and spread the word to as many people as possible. Let’s see how many people we can feed! 

Thank you to @sharingexcess, @feedingamerica, and @farmlinkproject for their help in making these deliveries possible.

When we come together with open hands and open hearts, we become part of something much bigger than ourselves. 🙏

#100BillionMeals
